section.title: Description
section.p: DROP DOMAIN removes a previously defined domain. You must be the owner of a domain to drop it.

plentry.pd: Do not throw an error if the domain does not exist. A notice is issued in this case.
The name (optionally schema-qualified) of an existing domain.
Automatically drop objects that depend on the domain (such as table columns).
Refuse to drop the domain if any objects depend on it. This is the default.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: This command conforms to the SQL standard, except for the IF EXISTS option, which is a Greenplum Database extension.
